20110124161648.000|20110124161650.000|CC1|       SO MOVING IS ER.

20110124161651.000|20110124161653.000|CC1|       YOUR ARTHRITIS PAIN,

20110124161653.000|20110124161653.000|CC1|       YOU AND YOUR DOCTOR

20110124161655.000|20110124161656.000|CC1|         WITH THE RISKS.

20110124161656.000|20110124161659.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,      
20110124161659.000|20110124161659.000|CC1|     MAY INCREASE THE CHANCE    
20110124161659.000|20110124161701.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACK OR STROKE,  
20110124161701.000|20110124161702.000|CC1|     WHICH CAN LEAD TO DEATH.   
20110124161702.000|20110124161702.000|CC1|      THIS CHANCE INCREASES     
20110124161702.000|20110124161704.000|CC1|    IF YOU  HEART DISEASE       
20110124161704.000|20110124161704.000|CC1|         OR RISK FACTORS

20110124161706.000|20110124161709.000|CC1|        FOR LONG PERIO          
20110124161709.000|20110124161710.000|CC1|   NSAIDS, INCLUDING CELEBREX,  
20110124161710.000|20110124161710.000|CC1|  INCREASE THE CHANCE OF SERIOUS
20110124161710.000|20110124161713.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS  
20110124161713.000|20110124161713.000|CC1|     OR STOMACH AND INTESTINE

20110124161715.000|20110124161718.000|CC1|   SUCH AS BLEEDING ANN OCCUR W.
20110124161718.000|20110124161718.000|CC1|   PATIENTS ALSO TAKING ASPIRIN 
20110124161718.000|20110124161720.000|CC1|         AND THE ELDERLY        
20110124161720.000|20110124161720.000|CC1|    ARE AT INCREASESK FOR       
20110124161720.000|20110124161723.000|CC1|   STOMACH BLEEDING AND ULCERS. 
20110124161723.000|20110124161723.000|CC1|  DO NOT TAKE CELEBREX IF YOU'
